item.title: Example Page
R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 2.24 ## 2 2 2.35 ## 3 3 5.01 ## 4 4 3.44 ## 5 5 4.90 ## 6 6 5.32 ## 7 7 8.06 ## 8 8 8.25 ## 9 9 8.48 ## 10 10 9.23

item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: help me use this! This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 1.84 ## 2 2 3.06 ## 3 3 1.92 ## 4 4 4.33 ## 5 5 4.62 ## 6 6 5.67 ## 7 7 4.12 ## 8 8 8.05 ## 9 9 7.
